section.title: Index of Morphosyntactic Properties: Wolaytta
section.para: Wolaytta paradigms employ the following property-value dimensions

listitem.para: Wolaytta follows the Cushitic-Omotic PNG Pattern.

Inflection Class: [In most inflectional languages, phonological and grammaticization processes conspire to create more or less marked morphophonemic differences in the verbal inflections of different sets of verbs.]

section.title: Index of Archive Paradigms: Wolaytta
section.para: The following tabel lists the shared property:value pairs for each paradigm, and then the variable property=value-list (comma separated). The abbreviation "PNG" in the paradigm variable-value lists stands for: gender:f,m,⊤ number:pl,sg person:p1,p2,p3 I.e., the PNG combinations normal with finite tam-forms.Clicking on the paradigmLabel will yield a display of the paradigm in question [either by link to hard-coded term cluster, or canned SPARQL query].
